name: ALPHACELL
description:
My very own side-scrolling Space Shooting game on Unity is called Alphacell.

No matter how experienced you are or how new to the game you are, everyone can play Alphacell. As a game creator who is extending their game development, this game was beneficial to me and helped me better understand game design.

You saw a lot of the features I used at the end of Alphacell, hopefully, including full movement and firing mechanics, scrolling backgrounds, enemies with varied movement patterns, waves of enemies, and space debris that spawned. You may have also noticed a fully featured boss battle, an interactive menu, and a high score system.
